post.author: mannerh
post.content:
I have the following positions available with a digital media company located in Toronto. If you know of anyone, please ask them to contact me.

 

User Interface Developers - Contract - Front-end, web development, in-depth knowledge of jQuery


User Interface Developer - Permanent - Back-end, web development, in-depth knowledge of jQuery;

 

Consultant, Technical Operations - Permanent (client may also consider contract) - J2EE, WebSphere;

 

Interface Development Manager - Permanent - Minimum 5 years of experience developing consumer-facing web based applications, ability to hand-code accessible, SEO-friendly web pages using semantic (X)HTML and CSS, Strong understanding of cross-browser issues and workarounds for older browsers including IE6, Expertise in object-oriented JavaScript development including DOM manipulation, jQuery, AJAX, JSON, experience working with third-party web service APIs such as Facebook, Twitter, Google Maps, etc, familiarity with web security vulnerabilities, 1+ years of experience with JSP, JSLT, XSLT, familiarity Apache HTTP server and mod-rewrite, familiarity with a source code systems (Subversion, Git, etc), Experience with Agile development, Experience working within a consulting agency. Assets not mandatory: experience in HTML5, CSS3 & jQuery Mobile, experience in Java, PHP, Ruby, Python, MySQL, DB2

 

Java Developer – Contract or Perm – Leadership ability, proficient knowledge of one or more of the following: WebSphere, Java, Strong knowledge of Webcentric technologies including HTML, DHTML, XML, XML, JavaScript, Strong Java knowledge, Assets: Perl/CGI, WebSphere Commerce.

 

Interface Development Manager - Permanent - Minimum 5 years of experience developing

Systems Administrator - Contract - IBM pSeries, System x & BladeCenter, AIX, Linux, Windows, IBM WebSphere Application, N-tier product systems, WebSphere MQ;

 

Project Manager - Permanent - 3 years experience as a PM managing major interactive or web development initiatives and 4 years experience managing budgets of $500k;

 

Endeca Developer - Permanent - 4-6 years experience and considerable exposure to multiple technologies, mastery of Endeca and Java, strong knowledge of Webcentric technologies including HTML, AJAX, XML, JavaScript, Perl and WebSphere Commerce are assets.

 

Digital Strategist - Permanent - Superb communication skills with the ability to clearly articulate ideas, verbal and written, 2+ years of experience creating content strategies for public-facing websites, a strong understanding of user-centered design and navigation principles, Expert knowledge of Microsoft Word and comfortable with PowerPoint, ability to analyze and apply Google metrics results to various platforms

Thanks Very Much,
Debbie Rae
debbiera@intps.com
INTPS Inc
(International Placement Services)
416-640-7466 x 7048
post.title: java 관련 구인입니다.
